channel.title: Home on Oliver Naaris
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Oliver Naaris

item.title: Lots of VM's at GrabCAD
item.description: The talk is about how we built a tailor made solution for GrabCAD Print Desktop app testing. We needed some way to test the GrabCAD Print desktop application on different Windows desktop versions with different settings (e.g. different region settings). Tests need to be run automatically and on clean virtual machines every time. Test results need to be collected and visualized.

item.title: Learning's from building an environment management tool with terraform
item.description: How we manage infrastructure in GrabCAD with Chef, Ruby and Terraform. Unfortunately the talk was not recorded.

item.title: Search Results
item.description: This file exists solely to respond to /search URL with the related search layout template. No content shown here is rendered, all content is based in the template layouts/page/search.html Setting a very low sitemap priority will tell search engines this is not important content. This implementation uses Fusejs, jquery and mark.js Initial setup Search depends on additional output content type of JSON in config.toml [outputs] home = ["HTML", "JSON"] Searching additional fileds To search additional fields defined in front matter, you must add it in 2 places.
